span: [READING] Okay, think aloud as you try to infer the hidden rule. You will be able to write your guess once the timer finishes.

summary: Notes same three colors in E & F

So a potential rule could be the presence colors, the presence of all three colors.
Um what else could there be?

I think the best guess I have at the moment seems to be that panels A, E, and F contain red, blue, and green, and that seems to be the consistent thing. I think I’ll have to go with that.
I can’t see anything else, unless I start getting into sizes or area.
